law.catch_line: The Commission may establish a merit system that includes all of its employees except:...

text.section:
The Commission may establish a merit system that includes all of its employees except:
the general manager, secretary, treasurer, and chief engineer;
the head of a department; and
a part time, temporary, or contract employee.

The Commission may:
appoint or promote a merit system employee to the position of general manager or department head or designate a merit system employee as the general manager or department head on an acting basis;
retain the employee in the merit system in the position or grade from which the employee was appointed or promoted; and
continue to exclude the positions of general manager and department head from the merit system.
